meta.author: Jingxin Jessica Feng

pages.title: About me
pages.text: Hi, I’m Jessica, a senior at Smith College majoring in engineering and computer science. My hometown is Beijing, China. I have a deep passion for Chinese food and cuisine. I enjoy being both a researcher and an adventurous explorer in my life. As a researcher, I am interested in applying my engineering knowledge to promote community healthcare. My current research project focuses on Effects of Ear Canal Geometry on Wideband Acoustic Immittance Measurements under the supervision of Professor Susan Voss at Smith College. Beyond my academic pursuits, I love travelling. I have visited several great places by myself. Swimming has been a part of my life since the age of 5, and I’m a proud member of the Smith College Synchronized Swimming Club. I love being a cheerleader! It is much more than standing in front of a crowd. It needs time, trust, and determination. I am a member of the Smith Equestrian team. I also work as a stage lighting designer. I’m a huge musical theatre fan. I usually stakeboarding to school. I like board games. especially poker. I enjoy visiting art galleries with my friends.

pages.title: Research
pages.text: Works in progressIn preparation – Secchia PA, McHugh CI, Cho NH, Feng JJ, Puria S, Nakajima HH. Estimating human cochlear health in situ from the basal region with high spatial resolution optical coherence tomography (OCT) Conference AbstractsIn review – Feng JJ, Voss SE. Effects of Ear Canal Geometry on Wideband Acoustic Immittance Measurements. American Auditory Society, Abs. 2024. Here are my research projects.. Smith College Voss LabEffects of Ear Canal Geometry on Wideband Acoustics Measurements These are 3D printed ear canals. This is HearID. This is Titan. I am writing a thesis under Professor Susan Voss’s supervision now. Chinese Academy of Sciences @ High SchoolStudy on the Social Defensive Behavior of Bumblebee in Various States Mass Eye and Ear Nakajima Lab• Trained deep learning model for delicate automatic structures segmentation on cochlea histology• Conducted a hierarchical training approach to enhance segmentation precision• Familiar with software: dragonfly, imageJ, Adobe Illustrator, and ImageScope• Took anatomical structures measurements within cochlear in slices of histology and OCT images• Wrote Matlab scripts to cut, downsample, and stack high-resolution images• Wrote Matlab scripts to investigate various numerical data of cochlear anatomical structures and their relationship with external factors

posts.title: 学术简历样本
posts.text: Hi! Nice to meet you!!I go by Jessica. I’m currently a senior at Smith College studying engineering and computer science.

posts.title: Markdown高级语法
posts.excerpt: 只有少数编辑器支持，或者需要安装相应的扩展渲染，使用前请先预览确认。
posts.text: 只有少数编辑器支持，或者需要安装相应的扩展渲染，使用前请先预览确认。 定义列表1234Term 1Term 2: Definition A: Definition B 会被编译成 123456<dl><dd>Term 1</dd><dd>Term 2</dd><dt>Definition A<dt><dt>Definition A<dt></dl> 目录通过[TOC]标记来插入目录。 在编辑器不支持[TOC]标记的情况下可以使用添加id的方法构建目录。 123456## Directory* [1.Content one](#chapter1)* [2.Content two](#chapter2)## <span id="chapter1">1.Content one</span>## <span id="chapter2">2.Content two</span> TeX公式内联的TeX公式使用一个美元符号标记。 1$\Gamma(n) = (n-1)!\quad\forall n\in\mathbb N$ 会被编译成内联（行内）公式：$\Gamma(n) = (n-1)!\quad\forall n\in\mathbb N$ TeX公式块用独占一行的两个美元符号来标记。 1$$\left \lbrace \sum_{i=0}^n i^3 = \frac{(n^2+n)(n+6)}{9} \right \rbrace$$ 会被编译成 $$\left \lbrace \sum_{i=0}^n i^3 = \frac{(n^2+n)(n+6)}{9} \right \rbrace$$ 如果你的编辑器不支持这个功能，可以手动解决。首先引入mathjax脚本： 1<script type="text/javascript" src="https://cdn.mathjax.org/mathjax/latest/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS_HTML"></script> 之后，在需要插入公式的地方使用 <script> 标签包裹公式： 12345<script type="math/tex">\Gamma(n) = (n-1)!\quad\forall n\in\mathbb N</script><script type="math/tex; mode=display">\Gamma(z) = \int_0^\infty t^{z-1}e^{-t}dt\,.</script> 以上公式展示效果，在实际显示过程中，根据网络加载速度不同会有不同的解析展示速度，TeX的语法参考请见这里。 UML图语法为在代码块开始行后面加入语法声明，如 ```mermaid ，然后可以像这样来画uml时序图： sequenceDiagram Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob,how are you? Note right of Bob: Bob thinks Bob-->>Alice: I am fine thanks! and U? Note left of Alice: SB 其MarkDown代码如下： 1234567\`\`\`mermaidsequenceDiagram Alice->>Bob: Hello Bob,how are you? Note right of Bob: Bob thinks Bob-->>Alice: I am fine thanks! and U? Note left of Alice: SB\`\`\` #代码块标识会被解析，实际上写代码块时不用添加转义符“\” 时序图的语法请见 这里 或 这里。 uml流程图： graph LR; A-->B & C-->D; 其实现代码如下： 1234\`\`\`mermaidgraph LR; A-->B & C-->D;\`\`\` 流程图的语法请见 这里， 更复杂点的flowchart可以看 这里 。 参考文档 MarkDown文档中如何画出流程图 https://github.com/wizardforcel/markdown-simple-world http://stevenshi.me/2017/06/26/hexo-insert-formula/ https://blog.csdn.net/u013282174/article/details/80666123 https://www.liuyude.com/How_to_make_your_HEXO_blog_support_handwriting_flowchart.html https://mermaidjs.github.io/
